page.title: A web development and design agency in Sweden | VEXXED
page.description: We are a duo of young and talented coders and artists that specialize in crafting beautiful websites and designs. We are based in Sweden; do not hesitate to contact us if are looking for experts to strengthen your brand and your online presence.

header.title: Is VEXXED for you?
header.subtitle: WHAT WE DO BEST
description: Do you own a small business and/or work as a solo entrepreneur? Well, then we are 100% the right ones to help you!
We specialize in helping professionals and small business owners that are looking for a cheap, reliable, and beautifully designed website.
